member.name: T:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController
member.summary: Manages quizzes within the application.

member.name: M:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController.GetQuizById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific quiz by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the quiz to retrieve.
member.response: Success on finding the quiz. The response body contains a basic representation of the quiz data.
Not found if no quiz exists with the provided ID.

member.name: M:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController.GetAllQuizzes
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all available quizzes.
member.response: Success. The response body contains a collection of basic quiz representations.

member.name: M:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController.CreateQuiz(LXP.Common.ViewModels.QuizViewModel.CreateQuizViewModel)
member.summary: Creates a new quiz.
member.param: Data representing the new quiz to be created, provided in the request body.
member.response: Created on successful quiz creation. The response body includes a location header pointing to the newly created quiz and a basic representation of the quiz data.
Bad request due to invalid input (e.g., missing or invalid name, negative duration, etc.).

member.name: M:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController.UpdateQuiz(System.Guid,LXP.Common.ViewModels.QuizViewModel.UpdateQuizViewModel)
member.summary: Updates an existing quiz.
member.param: The unique identifier of the quiz to update.
Data representing the updated quiz properties, provided in the request body.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input (e.g., missing or empty name, negative duration, etc.).
Not found if no quiz exists with the provided ID.

member.name: M:LXP.Api.Controllers.QuizController.DeleteQuiz(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a quiz by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the quiz to delete.
member.response: Not found if no quiz exists with the provided ID.
